1077280.name: Ultra Savage Soundtrack
1077280.description:
Ultra Savage船新音乐包，由原班人马打造。

作曲家与游戏画家皆为一人，为了做出完美空灵的音乐烘托气氛甚至时常熬夜。

曲目列表
01 - Prisoner 562 Has Escaped
02 - Savage Desert
03 - Out For A Swim
04 - King Triceps
05 - Strong Silent Type
06 - Off With The Heads
07 - My Healthy Imagination
08 - I Can't Get There In Time
09 - Shots Shots Shots
10 - How Did I End Up Here
11 - Timeless
12 - Dark Twisted Secret
13 - Twig Wearing A Wig
14 - Dead People Standing Up
15 - You'll Never See Me Coming
16 - Who's Pulling The Strings?
17 - ULTRA SAVAGE
18 - Turgut's Back
1077280.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 日语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 繁体中文
